scripts.dev:tests: export ODOO_TERMINAL_ENV=development && node scripts/build.mjs && poetry run pytest
scripts.start:firefox: export ODOO_TERMINAL_ENV=development && node scripts/build.mjs && web-ext run --verbose -t firefox-desktop
scripts.start:chromium: export ODOO_TERMINAL_ENV=development && node scripts/build.mjs && web-ext run --verbose -t chromium
scripts.start:chrome: export ODOO_TERMINAL_ENV=development && node scripts/build.mjs && web-ext run --verbose -t chromium --chromium-binary $(which chrome)
